name: Deer Avenger 4: The Redneck Strikes Back
name_original: Deer Avenger 4: The Redneck Strikes Back
description:
Deer Avenger 4: The Redneck Strikes Back is an action-shooter game developed by Hypnotix. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Simon & Schuster Interactive. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Deer Avenger 4: The Redneck Strikes Back is available on PC.
